summary: ENGINE BLEW WE TOOK IT  TO AVON, IN KIA DEALER. THEY CHECKED IT OUT AND SAID IT WAS A BLOWN ENGINE. THE SHOP MANAGER ALSO INFORMED US THAT THIS YEAR HAD INFERIOR PARTS PUT IN IT. THAN THEY TOLD US IT WAS NOT COVERED UNDER ANY RECALL AND THAT OUR WARRANTY HAD EXPIRED. WE HAD CALL KIA CORP AND THEY HAD GIVEN US A CASE NUMBER THAN THEY TURNED AROUND AND SAID THEY WOULD NOT COVER IT EITHER. THE VEHICLE WAS ON A HIGHWAY WHEN THIS HAPPEN HEARD A LOT OF METAL ON METAL AND KNOCKING  SOUND. HAD THE VEHICLE TOWED FROM THAT POINT.
